name: Monkey Jump!
description:
To get the best experience while playing the game, please use Google Chrome and reduce your zoom to 75% or 67% by using "⌘+"  for Apple or "Ctrl -" for Windows and Linux. It is a PC or Laptop game.

Key Features:
Collect bananas to gain health (they only work once you lose health)

Avoid enemies (If you come in contact with an enemy you lose health)

You can take 5 points of damage before you die

The 3 dots menu will allow you to continue or reset the level or go to the level select screen

The level backgrounds are based on real events in that continent

Switch between characters by clicking the icon of the character you want to change to at the top of the screen

Controls:
"W" / "Up key" / "Spacebar" is Jump

"W" / "Up key" is Up

"S" / "Down Key" is Down

"A" / "Left Key" is Left

"D" / "Right Key" is Right
